io.github.teamfractal.animation

Class AnimationAddResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.teamfractal.animation.AnimationAddResources
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAnimation

    public class AnimationAddResources
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAnimation
    Adds an animation that moves onto the screen then off again and displays the resources that have been added to or removed from the given players inventory
